sentences.en: “Ay, every inch a king!”(&b{Shakespeare})
sentences.cn: “哈，在每个方面都称职的国王！”(&b{莎士比亚})

sentences.en: a monitor with a 21 inch screen
sentences.cn: 21英寸屏幕的显示器

sentences.en: An eight-week-old embryo is only an inch long.
sentences.cn: 8星期大的胚胎只有一英寸长。

sentences.en: came within an inch of death.
sentences.cn: 临近死亡的边缘

sentences.en: Every inch of his arms and legs was ulcerated.
sentences.cn: 他四肢全都溃烂了。

sentences.en: He looks every inch the City businessman.
sentences.cn: 他完全是一副伦敦金融城商界人士的派头。

sentences.en: He tied her up and threatened her with a six-inch knife.
sentences.cn: 他把她捆起来，拿着一把6英寸长的刀子威胁她。

sentences.en: he was beaten within an inch of his life.
sentences.cn: 他差点儿被打死。

sentences.en: His life was saved by a quarter-inch-thick bullet-proof steel screen.
sentences.cn: 多亏一块1/4英寸厚的防弹钢板，他才捡了条命。

sentences.en: I inched forward along the ground.
sentences.cn: 我贴着地面缓慢向前挪动。

sentences.en: It is a very pretty butterfly, with a 2 inch wing span.
sentences.cn: 这是一只非常美丽的蝴蝶，翼展2英寸。

sentences.en: Make a slit in the stem about half an inch long.
sentences.cn: 在树干上切一道大约半英寸长的口子。

sentences.en: One 16-inch shell struck the control tower.
sentences.cn: 一枚16英寸的炮弹击中了指挥塔台。

sentences.en: Rainfall here is under 15 inches a year.
sentences.cn: 本地的年降雨量不到15英寸。

sentences.en: The bullet had passed less than an inch from Andrea's heart.
sentences.cn: 子弹在离安德烈亚的心脏不到一英寸的地方穿过。

sentences.en: The car moved forward inch by inch.
sentences.cn: 汽车一点一点地向前移动。

sentences.en: The curtains were an inch too short.
sentences.cn: 窗帘短了一英寸。

sentences.en: the shot missed her by inches.
sentences.cn: 子弹刚好没射中她。

sentences.en: The skirts were shortened an inch or two.
sentences.cn: 这些裙子被改短了一两英寸。

sentences.en: There stood Gertrude, looking every inch a star.
sentences.cn: 格特鲁德站在那里，完全是一副明星的派头。

sentences.en: There was hardly a spare inch of space to be found.
sentences.cn: 几乎找不到一丁点空余的地方。

sentences.en: We are prepared to fight for every inch of territory.
sentences.cn: 我们时刻准备着为每一寸领土而战。

sentences.en: you can't let him die by inches like this.
sentences.cn: 你不能让他这样慢慢死去。

trans.tran_cn: 英寸（相当于 2.54 厘米，一英尺有12英寸），少量，少许，身高
trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring length, equal to 2.54 centimetres. There are 12 inches in a foot.
to move very slowly in a particular direction, or to make something do this
